document.full_text: new york knicks leading scorer amar'e stoudemire avoided a one-game suspension when his 16th technical foul of the season was rescinded, the nba told reuters on friday.
document.title: stoudemire avoids one-game suspension as technical lifted
lines_and_colors: new york knicks leading scorer amar'e stoudemire avoided a one-game suspension when his 16th technical foul of the season was rescinded, the nba told reuters on friday.
